text: ''' ''' ''' ''' ''' Ronald "Ronnie" Merle McNutt was a 33 year old veteran of the United States Army. He shot himself with a shotgun. He died on Facebook live stream on August 31, 2020. He allegedly had PTSD (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder) from working in the military for so long his girlfriend left him. Facebook quickly took the live stream down after a few days of the live stream being posted on Facebook. Category:Suicide in 2020 Category:Deaths by person in the United States
title: Suicide of Ronnie McNutt
